title: death_wish
author: death_wish
content: While leaving an appropriate note that cryptocoinex is a bad person, I noticed this:QuoteThis user's password was reset recently.This user recently woke up from a long period of inactivity.Newbie-rank account, registered in 2015 with 5-year post gap 2017-2022.  Suddenly wakes up, resets its password, and starts throwing around agitprop... very suspicious.I have no time for this, so I will let someone else take it up.

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Just a word of advice, waking up and password reset does not automatically mean the account was hacked or sold. Just check out seclog, there are hundreds of accounts that wake up or reset their passwords each dayI know it might have been a hard day for you and the user might have been so annoying but you might need more evidence to pin the userJust wondering, who would want to buy a newbie account with little activity and no merits, yet they can simply just create one?

You, personally, are scum worse than a criminal.You are a cancer to Bitcoin, cryptocurrency, and all that is good in this world.  You are the reason why decent people have no privacy, while criminals enjoy as much privacy as they want.  You are a mouthpiece spewing poisonous propaganda to benefit the worst criminals on Earth.How did you go from cryptocoinex saying he has nothing to hide to the worst criminals benefiting from him?
